statements: SELECT * FROM message_content;

SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, message_time FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 2 AND receiver_id = 1;

SELECT * FROM multimedia_content WHERE upload_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, message_time FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1 OR receiver_id = 1;

SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message_text, message_time FROM messages WHERE message_text LIKE '%urgent%' OR message_text LIKE '%important%';

SELECT message_text, message_time FROM messages WHERE receiver_id = 2;

SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message_time FROM messages WHERE message_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, SUM(content_id) FROM messages JOIN multimedia_content ON messages.message_id = multimedia_content.message_id GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, AVG(message_id) AS avg_message_id FROM messages GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id HAVING avg_message_id > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id FROM messages;
SELECT MAX(content_id) AS max_content_id FROM multimedia_content;
SELECT MIN(upload_time) AS min_upload_time FROM multimedia_content;

SELECT content_id, content_type, content_url, upload_time FROM multimedia_content WHERE upload_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(message_id) AS avg_message_id FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, sender_id, receiver_id FROM messages UNION SELECT content_id, message_id, NULL AS receiver_id FROM multimedia_content;

SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM messages GROUP BY sender_id HAVING message_count > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT receiver_id FROM messages WHERE sender_id = 4;
SELECT sender_id, MAX(content_id) AS max_content_id FROM messages JOIN multimedia_content ON messages.message_id = multimedia_content.message_id GROUP BY sender_id;
